ingredients.ingredient: ¾ cup gluten-free baking flour (such as Premium Gold® Flax and Ancient Grains All-Purpose Flour)
½ teaspoon garlic powder, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
2 heads cauliflower, cut into bite-size pieces
½ cup hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's RedHot®)

cookingTips: Make a batter with flour, water, and spices - it creates a crispy exterior without deep frying
Toss coated cauliflower in sauce while still hot from oven so coating absorbs flavor
Add honey to hot sauce for slight sweetness that balances the spice
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Buffalo cauliflower is a vegetable-forward twist on classic wings. How would you sell this healthier option to someone skeptical about eating cauliflower?
